text: HC Kaustik Volgograd is a Russian handball team located in Volgograd. They compete in the Russian Handball Super League. ==Accomplishments== *Russian Handball Super League: **Winners (4) : 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999 ::Runners Up (4) : 1994, 1995, 2000, 2009 == External links == * * EHF Club profile Category:Sport in Volgograd Category:Russian handball clubs
title: HC Kaustik Volgograd
